dmca.title: Starstudioarts.com Requests Blogger Takedown of Image
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support:

I am notifying you of a violation of copyright. I have included the following information for you to take action as per the instructions on the Google website:

INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION

1. The copyrighted work at issue is an image that appears on: 
http://natallac.blogsport.com and the translated page; 
http://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=pt &u=http://www.omeudiaria.net/ptbloggers/link.php%3Fid%3D2914 &prev=/search%3Fq %3DArdith%28Staroatka%26start%3D30%26hl %3Den%26lr%3D%26ie%3DUTF-8%26sa%3DN

The image is labeled as "Late Summer" on one site and "Late Barkers" on the other website.

2. Search Query: google
	Infringing Web Pages (the url listed In green): www.umaudiario.not/ptbloggera/
	link.php?id=2914 - 84k

I created and own the copyrighted Image (material) originally entitled "Late Summer Apples" which can be found on my website at: http://www.starstudioarts.com/portraits_figure/late_summer_apples.html

3. You may contact me [private] via emall at [private]@frontiernet.net.

4. I, [private], am the owner/administrator of the website www.starstudioarts.com from which contains the image (material) that is being used illegally. I can be contacted at [private]@frontiernet.net.

5. I know for a fact that the use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information In the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
